thread.title: Tennessee's Unique Tunnel Road Trip Takes You From Creepy to Jaw-Dropping - NewsBreak
thread.title_full: Tennessee's Unique Tunnel Road Trip Takes You From Creepy to Jaw-Dropping - NewsBreak

author: Melissa
title: Tennessee's Unique Tunnel Road Trip Takes You From Creepy to Jaw-Dropping - NewsBreak
text:
By Melissa ,
1 hours ago This road trip winds you through the Volunteer State to several spooky, stunning, and straight-up cool tunnels. While there is so much to do in Tennessee, I love nothing more than an excuse to drive through the Smoky Mountains. I don't know about you, but it seems like lately, the mountains have been calling my name! In my personal opinion, the Smoky Mountains are the perfect place to go for a long weekend getaway. You can visit a cool little city like Gatlinburg or Chattanooga, or you can take a road trip and wind your way through mountains, and see more of Tennessee's gorgeous landscape. So how about a road trip through the state that will take you through several really cool tunnels? Read full article
Read in NewsBreak 3
